item.title: Get back claws command. NOT FOR NEWBIE CODERS!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dclaws")) { if(clawrights == 1 && playerHasItem(995, 200000000)) { addItem(6587, 1); deleteItem(995, 200000000); sM("You buy your dragon claws back for 200m."); } else if(clawrights != 1 || !playerHasItem(995, 200000000)) { sM("You either don't have the rights to use this command or you don't have 200m."); } }
Goddamn. Tested, works btw.

Read full topic
item.source: Get back claws command. NOT FOR NEWBIE CODERS!

item.title: Get back claws command. NOT FOR NEWBIE CODERS!
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Try this:

Add:

public void clawsback(){

clawsrights = 1;
deleteItem(995, 200000000);
addItem(6587, 1);
sM("You get your claws back for 200m!.");
} else {
clawsrights = 0;
sM("You have to have to claws rights to re-obtain these!.");
}
}

and add with the rest of your commands:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("clawsback") && playerHasItem(995, 200000000)){
clawsback();
}

Try that, and i think it would work.

Read full topic

item.title: Get back claws command. NOT FOR NEWBIE CODERS!
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

I think the problem is, you forgot to add the break; after sM("you either don't have 200m or don't have claw rights"); so try making it look like this, although it mighttt not work =[

if (command.startsWith("dclaws")) {
if (clawrights == 1)
deleteItem(995, 200000000);
addItem(6587, 1);
sM("you buy back your claws for 200m");
} else {
if (clawrights == 0)
if (!playerHasItem(995, 2000000000));
sM("you either don't have 200m or don't have claw rights");
break;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Get back claws command. NOT FOR NEWBIE CODERS!

item.title: Get back claws command. NOT FOR NEWBIE CODERS!
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

ok, here is my problem… I have a system set up where players get pk points from killing everyone
then they talk to an npc and if they have the sufficient amount of points they can purchase dclaws
so when they purchase the rights it switches on a cfile right called clawrights ==
and it adds 6587, 1 to their invent (dclaws id)
my problem is if the players lost their claws they can’t obtain them back and i can’t just whack it into any old shop because i only want those with clawrights to be able to buy them… so i thought up this code:

if (command.startsWith("dclaws")) { if (clawrights == 1) deleteItem(995, 200000000); addItem(6587, 1); sM("you buy back your claws for 200m"); } else { if (clawrights == 0) if (!playerHasItem(995, 2000000000)); sM("you either don't have 200m or don't have claw rights"); }
it worked and compiled with no errors but here is the problem:
if the player doesnt have 200m or they don’t have clawrights it still adds dclaws to their invent…
second problem: whenever anyone tries to do any other command it says to them you buy back your claws for 200m.

any ideas? if unable to help please provide an appropriate alternation to the one above.
if u successfully help me the u get rep ++
thanks,

—James—

p.s PLEASE DON’T POST IN THIS IF U DON’T KNOW WHAT YOUR ON ABOUT!

Read full topic
item.source: Get back claws command. NOT FOR NEWBIE CODERS!
